chapter.title: Employee Costs
chapter.para: In order to track the cost of an Employee's time as a Project expense, your system must be configured to appropriately map these expenses to your Chart of Accounts. In this chapter we will review how to configure CRM module to capture these costs, process Time Sheets, and review the General Ledger.

section.title: How to Configure the CRM Module
section.para: In order to track labor overhead costs you must be sure to configure the CRM module to accommodate this. Follow the steps below:

listitem.para: Open module by selecting CRM > Setup...

section.para: Select an appropriate expense account for Project Labor And Overhead.

note.para: If an expense account is not selected you will be unable to post Employee overhead costs to the General Ledger.

section.title: Process Time Sheets
section.para: Once items are mapped to a Project expense account and Employees are set up with a compensation value (See System Administration chapter) then you are ready to post time to the General Ledger. Follow these steps to process an approved Time Sheet.

listitem.para: Follow this path: CRM > Project > Time and Expense...

section.para: Highlight the Sheet to be processed check the Post Time box at the bottom of the screen and select the PROCESS button or right-click and select "Post Time."

section.title: Review General Ledger
section.para: Once Time Sheets have been processed, you can verify whether Employee costs have been posted as an expense by reviewing the General Ledger transaction reports.

listitem.para: To locate the General Ledger report, follow this path: Accounting > General Ledger > Reports > Transactions...

section.para: You will notice the Time Sheet number and transactions are now posted to the General Ledger as an expense.

section.title: Conclusion
section.para: The xTuple Time and Expense module is a powerful free component of the xTuple ERP, CRM, and accounting software that allows businesses to track, invoice, and pay professional services time-and-related expenses, tightly integrated with the Project Management subsystem of xTuple CRM. If you have questions about xTuple software, or would like to discuss training, support, or potential enhancements to the software, please contact sales@xtuple.com.
Thank you for your interest in xTuple ERP.
